name.baseName: Dry goods ; Freshly harvested fresh dates, grapes, peanuts, melon seeds, etc. ; Cleaning + drying ; All sizes; NESPS2
干货 ; 新采鲜枣、葡萄、花生、瓜子等 ; 清洗+烘干 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time of waste gas pollution production section (hours/year)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time of waste gas pollution production section (hours/year)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所述工业过程用于清洗和干燥新采摘的干货，如枣、葡萄、花生和瓜子。末端治理技术应用于处理此过程中产生的废水污染。这包括通过厌氧和好氧生物处理处理氨氮和有机氮，通过化学混凝和沉降分离处理磷，以及通过各种处理（包括静电沉降和袋式过滤器）减少化学需氧量和颗粒物（PM2.5 - PM10）。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码1372文件，在完整版文件中第2638页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isElectrostatic precipitation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of dust removal facilities (hours/year) / production time of production unit (hours/year)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是静电除尘，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（天/年）/生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
